description: Accomplished Windows System Engineer experienced in Microsoft Windows Administration, Task Automation, Application Packaging and Deployment, and Workstation Compliance. Extensive knowledge of BigFix, Microsoft Deployment Toolkit, PowerShell, and Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager. All of these have been used to markedly improve the efficiency of Windows workstation administration in the environment.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about solving problems and developing solutions to improve efficiency and usability.
